mapper.insert: insert into book_comment (comment_id, book_id, comment_level, comment_name, comment_time, cosumer_d, order_id, reply_time, comment_contains, reply_contains) values (#{commentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bookId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commentLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cosumerD,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{replyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{commentContains,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{replyContains,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.select: select comment_id, book_id, comment_level, comment_name, comment_time, cosumer_d, order_id, reply_time, comment_contains, reply_contains from book_comment where comment_id = #{commentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
